entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 30 in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
